full_summary:
## Landscaping and Grounds Maintenance Services for Embassy of Canada to United States in Washington D.C.

### Tender Details
- **Reference Number**: cb-950-92203577
- **Amendment Number**: 5
- **Solicitation Number**: 24-249258
- **Tender Closing Date**: February 2, 2024, at 14:00 Eastern Time
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: N/A
- **Expected Contract End Date**: N/A
- **Tender Status**: Expired

### Tender Notice Description
The Embassy of Canada is soliciting proposals for commercial landscaping and grounds maintenance services at its Chancery and Official Residence in Washington, D.C.

- **Services Required**: Land scaping, gardening, grounds maintenance, and exterior landscaping services
- **Location**: 501 Pennsylvania Ave. and 2825 Rock Creek Drive NW Washington, DC
- **Area of Maintenance**: Approximately 8300 sq. ft. for Chancery and 21,000 sq. ft. for the Official Residence

### Key Requirements
- **Statement of Work (SOW)**: The contractor will be expected to meet the requirements outlined in the SOW ensuring well-maintained gardens with an even cut appearance, squared-off lawns, and weed-free cultivated flowerbeds.
- **Supplier Responsibility**: The contractor will be responsible for providing all necessary supplies, including tools, equipment, materials, and uniforms, except as otherwise indicated.

### Tender Evaluation Criteria
- **Lowest Cost-per-Point**: The tender evaluation will be based on this criterion.

### Trade Agreements
- The contract is subject to the terms of the Canada-US-Mexico Agreement (CUSMA).
- The tender process will comply with the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

### Additional Information
For more details, please refer to the attached tender documents and addendum.
Tender Documentation: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28619/24-249258---wshdc---landscaping-and-grounds-maintenance-services---addendum-1_0.pdf> and <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28619/24-249258---wshdc---landscaping-and-grounds-maintenance-services---request-for-proposals_0_0.pdf
